briefTitle: Efficacy & Safety of Inhaled Insulin in Type 1 Diabetes

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes for at least 1 year
* Nonsmokers for prior 6 months
* BMI less than or equal to 35kg/m2
* HbA1c \> or = 7% and \< or = 11%
* Serum creatinine \< or = 1.8 mg/dL in female subjects and \< or = 2.0 mg/dL in male subjects
* FEV1 \> or = 70% of predicted, DLco \> or = 70% , TLC \> or = 80% predicted
* Maintenance of a treatment regimen of insulin less than or equal to 1.4 iu/kg/day
* Urine cotinine \< or = 100 ng/mL

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, asthma, any other clinically significant pulmonary disease confirmed by documented history, pulmonary function testing or radiologic findings
* Evidence of severe complications of diabetes
* Aminotransferase and/or alanine aminotransferase \> than 3 times the upper limit of normal

outcomeMeasures.title: Compare the Mean Change From Baseline to Week 52 in HbA1c
Change From Baseline in Weight to Week 52
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in weight at Week 52

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose to Week 52
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in fasting plasma glucose at Week 52

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects Achieving Week 52 HbA1c Levels Less Than or Equal to 7.0%
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects achieving week 52 HbA1c levels less than or equal to 7.0%

outcomeMeasures.title: Incidence of Total Hypoglycemia
outcomeMeasures.description: Defined as hypoglycemic symptoms that are relieved with carbohydrate intake or blood glucose measurement \<= 63 mg/dL, regardless of symptoms.

outcomeMeasures.title: Incidence of Severe Hypoglycemia
Total Hypoglycemia Event Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Hypoglycemic Events/Total Subject Exposure Time (in months)

outcomeMeasures.title: Severe Hypoglycemia Event Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Severe Hypoglycemic Events/Total Subject Exposure Time (in months)
